Today was kind of depressing because the weekend is going to be very buisy, I have many projects to finish, and the talent show is inching closer and closer. Oh yea, my new nickname in math is "eskim-yo". This is attributed to the fact that I got a nifty new hat.

Anyways, I decided to call my mom from school to inform her that I had to be picked up at 5:00. She said she would pick me up at 4:30 so I decided to leave early. She said we had to go streight to Downtown because my sister had a choir thing going on. Then she said that it would last an hour. I was angry, but when we went to the bookstore, I calmed down and read something very informative. I was reading a magazine called "Ad-Busters". Now that is MY kind of publishing. Anti-propaganda and philosophical. I URGE you to read it. It is very good and will show you new ways of looking at things.

Anyways, it snowed EVEN MORE, but the temperature is rising, so by the time I get up tommorow, the snow will be all gone. Oh yea, I have to go to a band concert tomorow AND go to the County Speech Meet. I have to do good like last time. I am in radio, if you don't know. Anyways, back to the snow. I rolled up a bunch of balls/boulders of snow. I also had a snowball fight against my sister. There wasn't much competition. Just me pummeling my sister with snow and me shrieking maddly in happiness.

ANyways, it is getting late and the lights around me are off. I better sign off

bye
-The Average Yo

item.dc:creator: A.Barnett
item.content:encoded:
Hey blog-thing....
My head seems to be pounding a lot lately, but I don't really mind it anymore. I guess, this sickness gives me comfort, for it brings the pain I am feeling inside out a bit. But, I must remind myself I am not aloud to feel such emotions such as anger, I don't want it controlling me. And that is the strange thing, I feel such anger that it tries to consume me. Just like the other day when Krista was saying she was going to die, I could barely contain myself from screaming or lashing out. I settled this internal dispute in art class, where I just devoted myself towards the sculpture, pushing away these stupid feelings. Maybe that is why human beings were created, so they could feel pain, regret, and misery like no other creature, to my knowledge, can do. Human beings have done so many things wrong, and yet it is only half of the argument-I guess there is always a bright side, however small or hard to find it may be. It is just, lately, I have been dwelling on so many things, so to keep myself from harm, I just ink it all in. I guess it is now a new obsession or something. Every since Thursday I have been inking my skin every night, adding new things every time and redoing old things. I don't think anyone will or ever will understand. It is a new outlet, not as good as letting the mental pain become physical, but it makes me feel better. By starting with my feet, I have to twist my legs into painful positions and the muscle cramp my ever persistable problem knees burn, and my neck has to dip to look, to strain. While some positions are admittedly easier than others, I can't help but feel better after I've done it, no matter how comfortable or painful the position is. I know this is a bad way to do things, to push away the feelings, but drawing or writing doesn't help any more, at least, not like it used to. I guess, marks make me feel good... I can't tell. I just feel so dead inside somedays. I know... I know Tuesday will be the deadest day of all. I have a meeting with Don, and I hate him so much. I know it is bad to complain and to hate, but Don is the only person I can find to hate, and for a really good reason too. A reason I can't tell, not even to you blog-thing. For if it were to get out, my life would dive into complete misery. People would give me those sympathetic looks, laugh behind my back, and just stare. They'd pry, they'd jeer, and this dead feeling inside would consume me. I can't let that happen, and I can't let such emotions control me. I am not aloud to cry, and yet... Sometimes it is hard not to. I just have to say, I am not aloud to cry, and I wont or I will and it wont be as much. For at school, you get in trouble for feeling if you aren't popular, get laughed at for crying, and just get in a pit of misery if you even try to shine. So, every morning I must greet the day with a smile, for if I don't? I get yelled at my peers. I must then hold that smile, that stupid mask of strong throughout the day until I collapse into my bed and go into my 'place'. I can be whoever I want, whenever I am alone.
~Amanda

item.dc:creator: ryochiba
item.content:encoded:
Today was the band feast/festival. It went terribly wrong, and I realised the truth. That many, many people are primitive minded. Woefully, I observed people's brains fizz out as their social escapades overloaded the truth. They, don't know how to shut up because they are just teenagers. Chemicals in their brains corrupting their systems. It is happening to me as I speak. I wish I was not cursed with these horomones, but of course, this is biologically the most efficient way to get the incentive to produce offspring. That is, of course, because the whole point of all of our existance it to make more of ourselves, and then die. All that job stuff, and the arts, are extracirricular. That's our role, and I accept the truth...

Anyways, at the festival thingie, I had to wait tables. I waited 3 times as many tables as everyone else. I hope I networked correctly. Anyways, my feet are aching, and that is why I am sitting here pushing buttons on a keypad, like some mind-altered zombie. When I look at the computer screen, I feel dizzy, like i'm floating, or rolling out of control. It is a very odd feeling. I hope I don't get a seizure...

Anyways, all the snow is dying and so are my feet.

Anyways, I have read amanda's post and it feels so, advantageous. I could bend the ways of proportion like a straw. It is just that I am stuck in semi-popularity. I must delve deeper into the cataclysmic tombs of the outcasts. I MUST. I cannot figure a way how though. I am being mean, of course. But, this is partialy because the chemicals in my brain are bending how my neurons work. I understand now, I understand. And yet, I try to share the information I am blessed with. No one seems to accept it. They will die, I will die, I care, they don't. They are oblivious to the impending fact of life. They seem as though they are meant for co-existance. They waste their time as idle manekins sitting in front of the Telivision. They ARE idle manekins. This is the time of their life, that many cherish the most, and they WASTE it on a BOX WITH LIGHTS? They could at least use it like I am. Letting my words ring free... even though no one will listen to me.

Well, tomorow I have to wait tables again. Yay.

Anyways, I really don't think I should have participated in that stupid class and I should have been able to work on my speech on my pet peeves. Oh yea, I got the best score on this chapters test in algebra class. I am very pleased. I hope my science test goes good as well. So, how's your life? Email me!

item.dc:creator: ryochiba
item.content:encoded:
Today was just another day that has passed me by. In math, everyone went insane about the math final. People were crying and whatnot. I don't understand what was so important. Practically everyone got an A and I got an A+!
It was a simple test with not many hard questions. Anyways, alot of people got good grades. Also, alot of people were complaining about how they were going to fail.

Today in social studies (history), we watched one of those kindergarten "School House Rock" movies. I can't believe they show us those stupid, stereotypical movies in such a high grade. I watched those movies BEFORE I was in preschool! They don't show the truth and it seems like the government injected it with SUPERPROPAGANDA horomones. It's very propagandaish. It had applauding people, associating positive stimuli with Red, White, and Blue. It also talked about how America was the best and it's "melting pot" example was positively irrelevant! I can't believe that I had to waste part of my life watching that video. It is a saddening disgrace to see 8th graders watching a cartoonish movie made in the 70's with corny tunes.

Anyways, everyone is so obsessed with "Lord of The Rings". You can tell it is a fad that no one will remember in 5 years. But, of course, it is too big of a part of peoples' lives. I mean, my friend Fred even missed school to watch the fantasy movie. It is sad how many people worship that kind of stuff. I think that they should realise that the "Lord of The Rings" IS JUST A FANTASY STORY! Fantasy=not real=not pertinent to today!

Tomorow I have to go on the talent show and I am afraid. Very afraid...
I shouldn't be afraid, There is no purpose to being afraid. Anyways, I have getting less traffic to my site. I think that is a good thing, and a bad thing. It is a good thing because it is an obvious sign that my publicity (Code Blue) threats are subsiding. The bad thing is that it is a sign that no one listens to me, which makes me sad. All in all, it all balences out.

I don't have anything else to talk about for now, so bye.

BYE;)

item.dc:creator: A.Barnett
item.content:encoded:
Hey...
I wonder, is there a disease that slowly eats you away inside? Something that makes you feel in control, but then turns you around? Is there some hidden disease that is making me feel such pain and misery? Sometimes, blog-thing, I don't want to go on. I just want to sit here and die. die. die. Ryo would probably scold me for complaining, I just feel so lost and hurt inside. So lost... I feel so big when people tell me I'm not, and I can look in the mirror and see I'm not, but in pictures I dislike me so much. I just want to make this pain real, maybe... No. I've thought about it. I can;t break my promise to Angela..
~Amanda

item.dc:creator: ryochiba
item.content:encoded:
Ok, now the break starts, woohoo?

Anyways, today was the talent show and I (yes me, the serious japanese dude doing his homework in the corner) was in it! I dressed up in a cow costume and danced moronically in front of the whole school. Very interesting reactions.... Before the talent show started, I was practicing at school. I wanted to try something new so I decided to try a backflip. I crushed my neck and now it is sprained. I look like a moron with my head bent to the left all the time. Anyways, I went on stage and performed with a hurt neck. Owwie...

All throughout the day it snowed, then it all melted in a 30 minuite period right before school ended. That just blew my hopes away for having a white christmas. Oh, maybe next year. This year I have to stay in this room in front of the box with pretty lights, typing on plastic keys with letters on them. I really should go on to write a disclaimer about my website and how people at school get offended about it.

Anyways, I can't find a place that has independent free techno music downloads. If you have any suggestions, PLEASE EMAIL ME! Anyways, I got a 92% on my science final. It was sub-par, but it could have been worse. At least I got an A. Anyways, I am going to be lonely over the next week, so might as well fight it by typing on the blogosphere. I really hope blogger doesn't go down. I REALLY HOPE. Anyways, the internet is pretty new and all right? So I am wondering what will happen as it ages. I hope everything remains free. That is one of the few reasons I go on the internet, because information is free! And it rightfully should.



Well, that is all I can think of to talk about. I had a ton of more stuff to talk about, but I forgot them all, being the forgetful person I am. I wish more people would read this, but I wish more people wouldn't talk about it at school. That won't be a problem considering that it is the beggining of winter break.
That is all
Bye

item.dc:creator: ryochiba
item.content:encoded:
I just want to send a shoutout to yours truly, ALEXIA-STIENWEG WOODS!

I don't hate you. I can't mention names can I? Child protection laws and such. I might as well make up a name and that is what I named you. I do not hate you. I do not have a devout hatred for you. What if that person was just another person. Maybe a figment of my immaginations. The one thing I have that Shishir has not crushed into tiny bits is my opinions. I protect them, and yiou are threatening them. Why do you hate me? I don't hate you. Trust me, if I hated you as much as you think I do, there wouldn't be a sane thing written on my website. Why are you on my website anyways? You are the one who choses to go to my website and consequently, you choose to look at my writings. DO NOT look at them if you will and misunderstand them. I have already heard from various sources what I have "supposedly" said to you. These accusations are truly and wrongfully false. Maybe I am a bit angry at you. You know why? It is like your against me. You bend my words like paper clips. And with those bent paper clips, you stab me in the eye. I only hate you when you bend your words like that. Now everyone believes you exaggerated stories and accusations about me. Thank you for destroying my life, but I still do not hate you. Why do you torture me like this. I do not hate you and I don't care what you think. I control my hatred for people and you don't so that is the reason you shouldn't be gossiping to EVERYONE about how you hate me. Maybe this is a huge misunderstanding or something, but it is really ticking me off. Sorry mr. Rice about this ranting buffonery but I need to clear this up once and for all. Please do not believe everyone you here because they probably twist the story a billion times before it gets to you. I do not hate you Alexia. And what's wrong with your name? Maybe I should call you Bob. I respect your privacy and that is what I named you what I did. Now, is that a sign of hatred? If I really hated you as much as you think I do, would I really protect your privacy? I think not!

item.dc:creator: A.Barnett
item.content:encoded:
After a nice long weekend of depression and lots of family togetherness I am tired. Perhaps too tired to care? Right now I'm enjoying writing about mental and physical torture and the end of the world and stuff. Oh joy, something to release this pain? I dunno. Maybe. I'm just so tired of this bull shit, pardon my language. Every time I think of Don I feel like kicking him in the nads, pouring anti-freeze in his eyes, making tiny paper cuts, pouring salt water over him, and then boiling him like a flippin' lobster. Or maybe I'll just be satisfied with him living in guilt the rest of his life? I dunno... I'm just so tired of all this crap. I feel like he's crushing my spirit slowly, or in Ryo's terms, stabbing paper clips into my eyes. Mom wont let me see Sunny right now, I might not see her tomorrow and its been about two, three weeks and I'm near my wit's end. I really need someone to talk to. I'm just too tired to care. I feel so dead right now.
~Amanda

item.dc:creator: ryochiba
item.content:encoded:
Hello, average yo here.
I haven't been updating because of chores, mathcounts, and getting angry at my sister. But those are just excuses. I guess you have more to write about when people at school make complete moronic fools out of themselves. Ahhh, humans are so predictable. My sister opened her present early. I hate my sister, she is such a weakling. Couldn't even wait a few days. Oh well, I hope she feels guilty on Christmas.

Well, my mathcounts game is going well. We are playing a questionaire kinda thing on a message board. I have alot of points and am dominating the competition. Yay. I still don't understand alot of things though.

Anyways, Amanda is complaining again. I should email her. I can't talk to her because I deleted to freaking AOL messenger crappalicious program. That program is the most annoying, idiotic, useless program I have ever had the discontent to use, see, and ratify. That program does more harm than it helps. Stupid idiot girls sending me messages. A window always pops up occasionally that says, "Do you accept this message from, soanso?". And I'm like "GO AWAY YOU FREAKISH MONKEY ANIMALS!, I HATE YOU!" So that is why I deleted AOL. I hate AOL. America online, hahaha. Their commercials suck unsuspecting middle age parents and tortures their kids. Good thing I subscribed to MSN. I feel sorry for all those AOL users.

Anyways, I better get going with emailing Amanda. She is the only person I can talk to who understands the things I talk about. The people who sit at my table at lunch blabber endlessly about trivial subjects like "video games", and "gangs" and what not. Those monkeys are trapped in a perpetual fountain of stupidity like no other. It's like they don't have any sense of intellect anymore.

Well, that's all for today, seeya later.

item.dc:creator: ryochiba
item.content:encoded:
Hello, average yo here again,
Today was boring, but I got to lie to my sister, which was very fullfilling. Well, since she opened her christmas present early (karaoke player), I packed them up and stashed them in my closet. I told her that the "opening presents too early fairy" came and took it away because she was naughty and because she opened it too early. Of course, she knew that I stashed it somewhere, but it was worth a try. Anyways, I am getting more and more in touch with my friend kiran. Not much to say there because we chat every day now. Well, theres this Korean kid (I'm Japanese) that goes to my old school. Guess what his name is? It is Roy. (My name is Ryo). I hope that kid doesn't replace me.

Guess what? I get to go to Justin's house. I am so happy. We are going to have a totally tubular and radical time at his house. I am planning to give him a gift. Nothing special, just a.... never mind that.

Anyways, there isn't much to talk about besides that the Mathcounts questionaire contest is tied up. 15 to 15 to 15. Very close. Almost christmas, but what is christmas anyways? It is mostly fabricated my capitalists and salesmen who want cash from families. Spoiling children everywhere. Sad holiday, but who am I to complain? It is supposed to be about Jesus and stuff, but this santa/rudolph/elves is totally fabricated my stores. It's like a hybrid between advertiesment and holy night.
Oh yea, today I went to staples and my mom and I got this chair that I can sit in while at the computer. I don't have to sit in this Target-Brand white chair that is unconfortable and weird shaped.

Well, that's all for now. Merry Christmas!

Average Yo here,
It is Christmas Eve everyone! Tomorow is the day that people wasted billions of dollars for!

ryochiba
item.content:encoded:
Wow, I sure am bored. I made a new banner for my site. It is more simplistic and easier for the eye.

Anyways, I was checking out other bloggers here in my town and most of the blogging/website population consists of colledge kids who are the "rebellious" type. Below this post is a picture of humans as we know it. If obesity in Americans keeps increasing at this level everyone will become like the man in the right by 2020! Humans change so rapidly....

item.dc:creator: ryochiba
item.content:encoded:
Today (Christmas!), many things happened. Most for the unfortuantely bad turn. I woke up today, put on (for the first time) my new Wave Ceptor watch and enjoyed the day. My dad was synchronizing his newly opened pocket PC on the computer when, poof! The computer crashed like a Boing 747. It wouldn't reboot and my dad got angry and sad. We just got the computer a year ago. My dad and I tried to fix it to no avail. Finally, my dad called Dell and got an "Official Nerd" to help him. They determined that the hard drive in the computer died. We originally thought that we would have to buy a whole new computer tower. Finding out that all we had to do was replace the hard drive, we were happy. I hope my dad gets it soon.

Anyways, since the main computer was totally kaput, you may say, "Why is he updating then, and how?" Well, luckily my dad kept an auxillary computer just for this occasion. Of course it is old and slow, not to mention obsolete. Running on an old processor and Windows 98, this computer has long lost its sheen. Anyways, I logged onto blogger and found that this computer didn't have a password cookie for my account. The main computer always automatically logged me on that I forgot my password, and my screename. I came into a panic, rushing to remember what my screename and password was. I went into a guessing frenzy, and eventually got it. I now apreciate how lucky I am to have a computer to type at now. If I lost the auxillary computer I am on now, I would have no way to update this site. I am so happy.

Anyways, I am going to Justin's house tomorow. I need to ask him what time he will pick me up. Hey, justin, if your reading this, EMAIL ME!

Anyways, I hope commercialism hasn't overtaken your Xmas (like alot of people I saw at Wal-Mart) because that isn't what it is all about. It is about !

Merry Xmas!!! NEW YEAR IS COMMING!

item.dc:creator: ryochiba
item.content:encoded:
Today, Justin is going to pick me up at 1:25 to go see a movie! Yay. I am so glad. Too bad winter vacation is over though. Might as well go to school. I have to make sure I practice my speech about my grandma and her life. It is worth 150 points!

My, actually my mom's, leather computer chair came today. I assembled it and I was the first to sit in it. Unfortunately, right when the computer chair comes, the main computer is totally crashed. I am sitting in my chair at this auxillary computer and it is bad. My dad spilled coffee on the keyboard and now it is moldy. There are little splotches of mold between the keys and when I type, my hands get all stiky. Ewww.. Not to mention the stains of some unknown liquid on the monitor. I am surprised this computer hasn't malfunctioned in its now 6 year life span. It has a creaky backspace button that is really anoying. I better wash my hands because they are all moldy and sticky. Ewww...

I gotta do my daily websurfing and wash my hands so bye
BYE;)

item.dc:creator: A.Barnett
item.content:encoded:
Hey blog-thing!
I know, I haven't updated in a long time and for that I send my deepest apologies. I have been quite busy trying to keep my little sister happy and alive... lol. Alive meaning I've been hitting her a lot lately because she's been asking for it, and also, she's been hitting me and it's a reflex. Christmas went well, except for the fact that I nearly had a panic attack when I went to Kurt's Grandmothers, Oma's. There were way to many people and I am not proud to say I saw something I shouldn't have. Luckily my little sister and I got to stay outside for elongated periods of time. My sister then came over on Christmas morning and Christmas night we stupidly ventured out to see the neighbor's Christmas lights. Oh well, I was in a ticked off mood. Angel wouldn't stop picking on me and Mom and Kurt's severe intoxication issue wasn't helping. Last night we walked in on something quite repulsive. I think my eyes are burning! LOL!
I seem like I'm complaing but I am not trying to. i'm just telling about my life and its crappiness from time to time. I spent a whole day trying to beat one level of a game, I finally figured out I had to boost my players level this morning -_-
anyways, I also haven't been updating because I haven't been on the internet. Mother has been very irritable towards me lately, f course os have I. I felt like killing nearly everyone in this house at some points. The idiocy annoys me such a great deal.
On higher note, I have been working on my stories and I've gotten quite an interesting plot line on each one! My favorite is Project Fallen Angel. t's set in the year 4000 and.... Well I don't want to give the plot away, but it's pretty interesting. My really long book is at a standstill however, I'm so disappointed. I'm trying to seek inspiration. Oh well.
I'll try to update again later.
~Amanda

item.dc:creator: ryochiba
item.content:encoded:
There is not much to write about here on winter vacation. The LOTR thing was ok, a bit sub-par ending. I expected more. It dragged on and on for 3 and a half HOURS!

Anyways, I just realized that winter vactation lasted another WEEK! I thought I would have to go to school tomorow. I don't know how to take it, good or bad. I haven't worked on my story, but I just thought up of something. Anyways, I accidentally ripped part of the brand new computer chair and I am planning to go to Lowes to get that vynal ( I have no clue how to spell it) repair gel stuff. I need to fix it before the rip gets larger. Oh yea, I just now realized that my story was on the other computer and it was lost when it crashed. Oh darn! I'm never going to recover that information because the hard drive is dead as a mad cow. I heard that Japan's crime rate is getting pretty high. A bad sign I suppose...

item.dc:creator: ryochiba
item.content:encoded:
Christmas isn't christmas anymore.

It has morphed into a capitalistic scam of a holiday. A money depleting, wastrel holiday. You know, Rudolph the Red Nosed Raineer was started by a shopping mall as a commercial/slogan for it's stores. People wasted countless ammounts of time and energy lavishly wasting money and time on idealistic products. It spoils children, and encourages uneeded spending. It is like "ULTRA Capitalism-XTREMEO Holiday". While everyone is touting the economies rise, people are getting into serious debt problems. Credit cards are an illusion to dumb teens who want to out-buy classmates. This plaguish attitude has spread to the young. I see these little kids, trying to out-get, out-perform the next kid. Typical conversation starter for the next 3 weeks is:"What did you get for Christmas, I got...". I don't freaking care what you got, why does it matter? It is like taunting and forces you to to try to get more. It is scary. And the only bad thing is..... is that I participated in it.........

-The average yo

item.dc:creator: ryochiba
item.content:encoded:
I just ate breakfast and remembered that I forgot to update this site yesterday. Both school and a new year a aproaching like a freight train. Another year poofs from my life, and yours, and everybody elses... That is unless you are an eternally living organism, are you? I saw "Bowling for Columbine" it was good, but I already knew all that stuff about America killing Americans since I was like 10 years old. Everyone else is surprised with it because they never knew about media frenzies. All the unassuming people at school always trusted the media, now that's pretty sad. Trusting the media is sad. They never knew the media picked out stories that had african americans in it. All the people around me are oblivious to the nature of media and their syndicate overridden hulls. Ahhhh, the incompetence of people around me always makes me feel better. I think I am safe to say this because the people who come to my site have drastically reduced. Consequently, I have a less chance of certain choice people seeing this.

Hey, did you notice that I never use full bad words on here? I think that is amazing considering that everyone around this corn infested farmland uses offensive words all the time. Certain (Stupid and incompetent I might add) say offensive words like this in front of teachers. There's this school in the city near where I live called "Klondike". Their only conversation starters are, Well, maybe I shouldn't tell you because it is way too offensive. I mean, with the publicity outbreak and all, teachers could see this. I have to censor myself. Isn't that ironic? I'm on the INTERNET and I have to censor myself. I hate it when people bother me about my site, makes me feel like crushing them. If they are offended, DONT GO TO IT! If you want to know where it is, USE A SEARCH ENGINE! If you want to learn how to make a site, USE AN ONLINE TUTORIAL! Simple as that folks, now shut up and let me be.

Anyways, today I am going to Indianapolis (People around here call it "Indie" I have no idea why) to celebrate new years. I have to remember to practice my speech about my grandma. I gotta gotta practice. I can't believe this site is this old. I want to keep this site untill blogger goes down, I really hope blogger doesn't go down. It has a good probablility that it will survive though. It was purchased by google, and google is HUGE. But internet companies crash so fast. One day you see it, then it says, "This page cannot be found..."or"error 401".

I have to practice for mathcounts, but I can't practice because I don't understand anything. I can't even remember what factors are(Shishir, my friend, told me what they were, but stupid me forgot)!

Well, I feel rejuvenated that I wrote such a long post and now, I guess I am redeemed for one more day of doing nothing at all. Without school, life is a bore. With school, life is a chore. I would choose school.

Seeya ;)
-The Average Yo

item.dc:creator: ryochiba
item.content:encoded:
Guess what?
It's a new year...

Now what do we do?

I have nothing much to write about besides that I am very angry and I don't know why. We got a new microwave. The old one we had was 12 years old. Our new one hardly makes a sound and cooks evenly. Well, there isn't much to be said because this new years wasn't expecially eventful. On New Year's eve my family and I went to this great Japanese restaurant and all. It was great.

My friend Kiran (who lives in alabama) sent me an e-mail. It was poorly gramatacized and had NO capitalization. Alot of mail/internet-talk now days is a monstrous amount of gramatical diarheah. It is sad how people you know are smart can't even talk right. Even if it saves time, most of the people who do this have tons of time to waste. Their time isn't even worth anything. Oh well, now people are going to criticize me when I go to school. Anyways,

item.dc:creator: A.Barnett
item.content:encoded:
Oh dear blog-thing if I hear so much as another set of atrocious noises I will scream!
over-reacting? Let's see YOU try sitting here listening to a simply disgusting display of animalistic noises. I swear, first she coughs without covering her mouth sending spit and germs flying everywhere, but now it's with this horrid sniff, sniff, sniff, slurp! and down the snot goes! Ugh... It is going to make me sick, sick, sick, sick! I'm trying not to complain, honestly I am, but dear Ra, L-Sama, and any other name you can give to the greater entity above, I'm near my wit's end! My goodness.. So...So...Repulsive...
ok, let's try and ignore it again...
Anyways. My sister's over here in one of her little moods. She has chosen the slappy happy world of depression today. Her past time this evening was slicing off lady bug heads and impaling their bodies in her room at her Dad's! Tell me, isn't that just lovely? *strained smile*
Right, right.. pushing on through I've had a nice day chatting on the internet, had lots of laughs that I did. My stomach doesn't hurt too much and I'm sure I'll be less sarcastic and forgiving in the morning.
~Amanda

item.dc:creator: ryochiba
item.content:encoded:
I miss school.
I miss school, and does that make me a nerd? I am fine with being a nerd.
I miss school so much I am going to write about it. My school day is broken into 8 periods. Eight periods of calmness, calamity, and memorization. In these eight periods, a variety of inputs and stimuli are invoked upon me and the results are varied. First period is band. I play the clarinet in band. I think the clarinet section is the only section that actually does good. I don't know why. Trumpets are too loud. Trombones are too soft. Tuba is inaudible. Flutes and oboe are... Actually, the flutes and oboe are very good also. Odd...
Anyways, my sister is going to sleep and turned to thight off so I decided to turn the monitor off. I am typing without the screen now.
More about band... Inside contacts have indicated that a few choice individuals cheat and... Well actually, everyone cheats. We have this thing called practice cards that you have to fill out over the week and have your parents sign. Everyone cheats on those things.
On to second period, I forgot what I had for second period, oh yea, the "special classes". In this second period timeframe, we have different classes that correspond to each quarter of the school year. There are four classes. These consist of "Industrial Technology, Foriegn Language (french for the 8th grade, spanish for the 7th grade), Family and Consumer Sciences( Called FACS or Home Ec.), and art. The new quarter is going to bring FACS for me. I have no idea what they are going to teach this year. All I know is that they promote milk diets. Next is third period, which is math. I am in a "advanced class". It is called algebra. It isn't advanced at all and the class is stereotyped as genius level education. The saddness is that everyone learned algebra in fourth or third grade. It is sad that the "normal" kids are going to have to learn it next year in high school. In math, we have a very colorful teacher. I can't give names or anything, but he makes up alot of nicknames, especially for me. I am called eskim-yo, stampey, and Kow. Who knows what my math teacher will think up next. I could write a book about my math teacher, but I can't with my time restraints. Plus, it's ten at night. Maybe I should write about school later because if I continually wrote about school constantly, it would take up the whole webpage. I got to third period and I have a huge paragraph. Wait untill I get to lunch. I get most of my ingenius/depressed/angry/philosophical thoughts right before lunch. I forget them after I eat my food though. Ahh, the saddness of human minds. Anyways, you can kind of tell that I miss school. Once I get there, I know something wrong will happen. I am a klutz. Last year durring winter, I slipped on the ice in front of the school. Another day I got stuck on the bus door. The bus driver closed the door while I was walking through it. Odd huh?

Anyways, I have passed these maladies alive, so why complain. Well, I don't care if no ones reading this because these writings are for my own records. I only put it on the internet to give people the oportunity to read about my thoughts. Well, I have to go to sleep. Bye people of America/Earth! I will see you tomorow, that is if a meteor doesn't crush the Earth.

Seeya ;)

item.dc:creator: ryochiba
item.content:encoded:
I haven't been updating because my dad has been on the internet 2 days in a row fixing the black computer. NOW IT RUNS! Anyways, right after he fixed it, we got the Blaster Virus. How unlucky is that? Well, all software on our computer is gone, all documents, everything. My dad's been downloading tons of stuff from the internet and I couldn't get to updating my blog. I am now on the black computer and it is so much better than the old one.

Tomorow is the day that school starts. I can't wait, yet I don't want to go. I like having a set schedule, but I hate homework. I shouldn't be complaining. This middle school has hardly any homework compared to some OTHER schools I know. I mean, homework is hardly existant sometimes. Anyways, I have to do a speech on my grandma. I timed it and I was just under 2 minuites. My mom got me the general information, but "nitty gritty" details are unfortunately out of my grasp. Today is my one shot at practicing it and here I am, typing on a computer.

Anyways, there has been a flood warning around the place I live. I saw the creek and it was pretty high. The thick, brown water penetrated this one persons lawn. I'm afraid to type things because my parents know about my site now. I guess I could encrypt it and change the adress or something, but I am too lazy. I wish my parents didn't know about this site. They could be reading it right now.

Sometimes I get angry and I don't know why. If I have too many things to do, I get angry. When I can't do those things, I get even angrier. I have to take this ACT test at the local high school sometime this month. I am angry, but will get angrier if it gets canceled. I am very oxy-moronic. I have so much to type about, but I am getting angry. If my parents read this, maybe they would take me to a mental institution, and that WOULD NOT BE GOOD.

Bye ;(

item.dc:creator: A.Barnett
item.content:encoded:
I'm sorry I haven't been updating. I just, I dunno... I feel so close to a breaking point right now.
I know, I know. Excuses excuses I'm being a freaking hypocrite. I just can't help it. I'm tired, and I'm sick of everything. Angela had just.. Changed so much and it hurts. I know I shouldn't feel anything as I'm not good enough to do so but it just hurts. It hurts so much and sometimes I just can't take it. I dislike this vulnerable feeling. I dislike these feelings I'm having when someone gets near me anymore. I just want to run away or get it over with. I can feel that little crack in me just getting larger and larger. Yet, I'm afraid to approach it because I don't want to wind up like Angela. For the love of everything decently sane she was out in the middle of the street waiting to get run over the other day! Sometimes I don't know how much I can take. This feeling is so horrid, so ghastly it seems more than I can bear sometimes...
decently yours,
~Amanda

item.dc:creator: ryochiba
item.content:encoded:
It really stinks because Amanda has moved 2 seats behind me.
I know that's pretty close, but we can't talk as much. I'm afraid to download AOL (after the horrid, antisocial things it did to me) and that's what amanda has. The only form of casual communication now is MSN Messenger. AMANDA IF YOU ARE READING THIS, PLEASE TURN ON MSN MESSENGER WHEN YOU GO ON THE INTERNET, THANK YOU. Anyways, I talked to this girl (I guess she's a bit cute, I'm going to regret that...) at lunch and she informed me that she looks on my website. Maybe I should censor this site, but maybe not. An artist must express themselves however possible. Anyways, the new poll is up so vote on it.

My palmIIIxe phase is working well. Not to many people are going the way I have expected, which is good. I expected the exaggerated nonsense of shoulting and proclamations that I have a palm pilot. This result would in-turn get attention to my palm pilot consequently causing a teacher to take it away. Since that has not happened, I am grateful that everyone has actually matured. Also, there is distraction on the bus because the Islamic kid beside me is always being teased unfairly about his religeon and his music prefrences. Because of this, attention is directed toward him and I can peacefully study the periodic table on my Palm. I have devised a code system so far...
Code Blue: Attention/Publicity threat, keep your heads low and brace yourselves...
Code Red:... I can't remember
Code Green: I hate the person beside me, someone help
Code Purple: Teacher in the vacinity, use caution when using vulgar words
Code Orange:....Who knows?....
I can't remember some of the stuff I think of at school because I study all this stuff and the extra info pushes the extra knowledge out of my cranium. I hope I can talk to Amanda soon. Bye everyone....;)

item.dc:creator: ryochiba
item.content:encoded:
I couldn't update on Thursday because I was rushed on homework. I studied Mucho Hardo and did all my homework, wrote all my essays, prepared all my speeches, etc. etc... Anyways, the bottom line is that I was totally confined to my homework. You can... you can say that the homework enslaved me and I was held captive by it. Anyways, I have all these things to talk about and I don't remember most of them....

What do I do to get a scholarship? I really need one. If I don't get one, that would be bad considering that the college rates are SKYHIGH right now and they are rising. I can't believe that the Saudis are getting free college educations. I guess they have to spend all their money somewhere. I guess Saudi Arabia spend it on better things than most people ***looks around the White House***.

What do I do when I need a job. I need to pick a career. I need a stable job, I need to do some networking, I need to get some books and read about buissiness and finance. I really need to do some studying. I am not so proficient in understanding things, but I'm willing to learn. I am willing to learn just like a ton of other poor immigrants. I need a plan.

Anyways, I should change the site color, it needs sprucing. Something sherbet... Something white... Maybe a bit of creativity... I have no clue... Today at school, I went to band and all the other classes and I feel like such an outsider. In homeroom today we got this little white slip of paper. It was a ballot for who we chose people out of the 8th grade who would be "class clowns" or "most fun on a desert island". It conjured up a memory that was hard to swallow down. When I was a little kid and I got a yearbook, I turned it to the very back. In the back had all these tall, big adult like teenagers who were labled "class clowns" and similar other names. I wondered when I would ever become like those people. When I got the paper, I secretly said in my head, "Wow, I'm Old". Then I started feeling really scared at what I will have to face in the future. I am nervous. Anyways, I casted various votes, and when I was done the teacher said, "Telling your friends what your votes were skrewed us up last year, Don't tell your friends your votes this year!" I understood and vowed not to tell. In the hall most of the popular monkeys splurged their votes to all the popular people in the vicinity. Of course, popular people are going to vote for certain popular people, and my conclusion is that all the people who are picked by those things are going to be stinking popular. My conclusion could be wrong, I have to wait untill it is spring to find out.

Anyways, I have to get to studying this book, The Light in The Forest and taking notes on it. This weekend, I also have many other things to do. My favorite thing I can look forward to this weekend is changing the colors on this website. I feel like a nerd/failure now. Someone help me....

-The Average Yo

item.dc:creator: A.Barnett
item.content:encoded:
I've been crying, but it's stopped for a while now. That is so weak of me but I can't help it. I can't help it and my eyes are burning. It feels as though hot ash has been poured into them. They blurr and everything around me blurrs too. Maybe it is because I have not cried in so long. Maybe I should record what happened. My sister came over and she got depressed. I tried to get her to come inside when she went out in thin clothes and no shoes. I stayed out there without a coat, trying to make a point on what she was doing to us. Yet, it didn't work. She eventually came back in but then she went for the knives and couldn't stop crying. I was so frightened. Fighting has always frightened me. It reminds me of so many nights spent in terror on the couch. She hates us all. She thinks Mother loves me more, and she doesn't. They were so angry. I can't place anything anymore. I feel as though it is all my fault. I feel horrible... And I wish I could wake up from this nightmare. I want to wake up. No one will wake me up. I feel so lost. I don't want to be crying. I feel so trapped, just in a maze. Is this what is feels like to have your heart ripped out? To loose what you love? I don't know... I can't remember the time so long ago. The thing that should have never happened. The one thing that haunts me even when I'm awake. I'm sorry. I'm sorry. I'm sorry to everyone. I'm sorry for everyone....I am sorry because sometimes smiling isn't enough.
I just want to wake up.
~Amanda

item.dc:creator: ryochiba
item.content:encoded:
I have not been updating because of my moronic addiction to Aces High (there's a link on my page if you want to download it). I should have updated, I should have. I didn't do my worthwhile share of studying this weekend. I shall suffer because of it. I studied, just not to the extent of my own self-happiness. My satisfaction of myself has diminished. Now the minuites are ticking away untill the bus comes.

I bet school will be very amusing and I will have more to write about. At school, there are more variables inputted into the big mix. Today, I hope they don't make fun of the islamic kid, or else I'll go ranting like a psycho again. These "ranting sprees" usually happen in the afternoon, after some little kid makes fun of me. When those small kids make fun of me, I get very angry, but it is to my advantage. This is because I can devise what to do when they make fun of me. The next time they laugh at me, I laugh back and curse their intelligence happily. Then smile and then go away. That is the most satisfying feeling, when you surprise the enemy so much, they don't understand.

I talked to my friend Kiran (lives in alabama) on the Internet. He made me feel really dumb, but I guess he's always going to have more brain capacity than me. He got All A+'s and his lowest grade was a 98%. He says it's too easy. To top it all off, he goes to a private school. It seems at school, people are smarter than me and back in Alabama, people are smarter than me. I guess you can't be top of the line all the time. But still, I feel like a failure. I failed. I guess this justifies when I get angry about when people call me smart. I guess all my rants are justified. I guess saying, "I guess" means that I am nervous.

School starts in less than one hour. I have to go soon. So, what's to talk about. A blog is like a tool for someone who talks to themselves. Today, I will try to talk less. I always feel like a fool when I talk. It's one of my worse points. I still haven't written that speech, to my dismay. If my Communications teacher looked at this, I bet she could find millions of gramatical errors. I'm thinking of changing the color scheme, but I forgot what numbers to change in the huge jumble of code. I guess I'll have to guess and check later today. I bet I will have alot of homework today. If I don't, I will probably play Aces High. I don't know why I play Aces High so much. I'm a really bad pilot. Anyways, It's officially 2 minuites before I leave, so I should start all that concluding junk before the bus comes.

In conclusion, I would like to say that when I get home from school today, I hope I will have something more interesting to talk about. I hope a little kid makes fun of me so I can laugh at him. I hope I start ranting on the bus to protect that islamic kid's rights. I hope I can disprove everyone at my lunch table. I hope...

item.dc:creator: ryochiba
item.content:encoded:
Ok, This is the Average Yo here.
I'm running a bit short on time. If I type for about 30 more minuites from now, I will get 7 hours of sleep, which isn't advisable since I have to go to a Math Counts meeting next morning. I really feel stupid at those meetings because I am in 8th grade and all the other 7th graders are way more knowledgeable at the subject of math. Anyways, I've gotten to write my optimist club speech. It is turning out quite nicely, but I need to make it aproximately 4 minuites, and I haven't come close to that. I guess it's a start though...

There's this outrageous program at school that the "School Board" has issued all the schools to do. It's called AA. Not alcoholics anonymous, no, even worse. To top it all off, it is mandatory every monday. This monday she explained it and it seemed like a piece of crap schedule. We talk about subjects like "happiness", and "respect". This is so stupid. Unlike other people, I have morals and I don't want to participate in this idiotic propaganda nonsense. My schedule is already packed, and now this stupid AA routine takes up my time. AA is causing me to get 7 hours of sleep tonight because I have to type about how angry I am about it right here, not to mention all the lost homework time. I hate this idiotic waste of my precious time. If you look up at the counter above, you can see that I hate wasting my time because I only have that many days to live. This AA thing is stagnant of mediocre moral teachers. If people want to harass people, that's fine with me, just as long as it's not me. This stupid AA thing should be abolished. I repute this moronic waste of my life. I don't care about "kindness" or "respect". Just stay away from me, and the situation will be fine. My conclusion is that this AA project that the "School Board" has burdoned upon us is burining my flesh and causing much stress. This AA thing isn't going to help society at school. It's a totally wrong approach. I am going to hate mondays now.

Ok, what else do I loathe to abolish. Well, there's been yet agian another discrepancy on the bus. These sheela gits(new word for stupid moronic stagnant girls) in the back are making this islamic kid rap and dance. It is disgraceful. I think these girls, and anyone encouraging this behavior should be immediately terminated and disposed of. I repute these unintelligent monkeys, yes I do. Picking on islamic kids, how disgraceful. They say that they are Christian, but they lack even the most simple morals. I couldn't respectivelly stand up for myself because the Islamic kid did it on his own whim (kind of). I know I will get my chance to rant soon. These discrepancies are slowly climbing toward the point of ludacracy, and that's when I strike. I wonder if anyone is listening to me?

At lunch, I want to sit with Amanda because she is alot more knowledgeable than all the people at my table. Unfortunately, I can never find her. I look around and I can't seem to find the familiar blue jersey that she always wears. If I do see her, I am a bit too nervous to sit with her, but alas, this girl with black clothes keeps folowing me calling me her "best friend". I would rather sit with satan then with her anymore. I gotta summon up my courage. I'm sick of the people at my table. They are stagnant of propaganda. I wish I had AIM again. I like to talk to Amanda. I should e-mail her.

I was thinking, I have to go to Harrison High School soon and with the High School comes all that Prom and dating stuff. Being the nervous person I am, I am worrying about the Prom stuff. I would like a date, but who's going to accept my gratuities? I should just stay home. But on the other hand, I DONT want to stay home and let this moment pass me by. It's contradictory and going in tangents in every way. I have 2 people I could possibly ask. I would rather ask one than the other. If I revealed it, then I could see how fast this information spreads. But, on the other hand, I could keep this information for another day. Prom is the word that lingers in my mind.

Well, if you read all that stuff that I just wrote, you must have alot of time. Feel free to email me. I gotta go

item.dc:creator: ryochiba
item.content:encoded: I feel extremely disapointed in myself. I did well in everything, except everyone else did a better job. I feel like I don't even belong in a Rural Public Middle School in the middle of a cornfield. Now how sad is that? I can't even compete anywhere. I am a worthless pile of feces. I think everyone's my friend only because they feel sorry for me. That is even sadder. I am being looked down upon by people. I should crawl into my hole and study. I have nothing fun in my life. Nothing is fun anymore. Everything is the same. Everything is bad. All hope is lost.......................................

item.dc:creator: A.Barnett
item.content:encoded:
I'd just like to say, darn it all! First off,let me tell you a story blog. This story is about a pair of sisters who made of a promise. This promise was that they wouldn't give up on life, no matter how hard it was. This promise took place after both sisters had wounded themselves. Years down the road, the smaller sister's heart kept getting broken over and over again as she watched her older sister waste away and forget the promise. Finally, there came a time when the older sister just flat out gave up, shattering the poor little sister's heart and breaking the promise. The little sister thought all that had happened, all the bad things, that had happened to everyone, were her fault. She was very devastated by not only her thoughts, but the broken promise. So late at night the next day she finished by breaking all ties with the promise. She did the one thing she said she wouldn't, and said, this is it. I will hurt no more. And so she brought some of the pain to reality. However, the little sister's mother found out a day after and she had to explain. In doing that, the little sister's confidence of staying clean were forever solifyed.
So that, blog thing, is the story of the 'X' or the 'Cross' and the 'broken promise between sisters'. Did you enjoy that story? Good, I'm not in the mood to repeat it.
Anyway, school was fine but I share the same fustration at lunch. All I hear about are gross and atrocious things, and now that Ryo has mentioned High School, I have begun to fret about prom and such stupid things I shouldn't worry over. However, ala, I cannot help it. I feel so big, who would want to date one such as myself? I can bet my reputation is already trashed! I can hear it now, they'll call me freak, or blob, or something relating to what's going on with my sister. I will be ridiculed for things I haven't done or haven't planed on doing. Oh the tragedy.
Anyway, I also dislike the 'AA' thing that's goin' on. I do not believe in too much optimism, and I believe it takes time away from our studies. I do have my honor code, and I don't believe its necessary for us to listen. It's lame and stupid in my opinion.
In school today I jammed my finger at the 'BUG' awards, or whatever it was. But I did find one thing out; I suck at basketball. Isn't that great?
Anyway, maybe life will;l get better..............or maybe we'll all die!*laugh* joking.

item.dc:creator: ryochiba
item.content:encoded:
Guess what?
Today wasn't that bad. I would like to now explain the situation at my lunch table. My stupid classmates are so uneducated and so assuming. They assume that knowing about guns makes them "cool" and that because they play lame war games, they know about guns. They are so stupid. Always talking about guns and how they are making them. I really doubt ANYTHING they say is true. It is like they have no morals or anything. Guns? Is that all they care about? They should be shot in the hand a couple of times to experience the pain guns generate. To worship objects like guns is a sick practice only reserved to war veterans and scary people you meet in the street and in the country. Shishir are on the other side of the table laughing. I don't want those people to stop loving guns though. You ask why? Well, it's because people like them are the people who make physicians RICH. They shoot someone and boom, cash flows in. Being a physician is a very stable job. I know it will still be stable in the future because there are endless people who get hurt because of stupidity. I love the world :)

Anyways, I have to write my optimist club speech. I sent half of my speech to Mr. Rice (My math teacher) and he said it was only "OK". He said it wasn't great yet. I'm sooo not going to win that scholarship. I feel like I am being hammered down. I got all this competition. Also, there's been another discrepancy in COMM (communications class). I sit next to this girl called Lauren Braun. Everytime I talk, she insults me. It used to be funny, but not anymore. I think she should learn some manners. I don't do anything to her and she slams me into the ground face first. How enjoyable is that? I think she is just getting rid of her anger, but maybe she should disperse her anger in different ways. I type on this blog to disperse my anger.

I spent 2 hours working on math today. I think that is a reccord. Maybe it is, maybe it isn't. So, I have nothing good to talk about besides my misery and sorrow. SO I guess I say bye now. bye...

item.dc:creator: ryochiba
item.content:encoded:
This is average yo here,
Today was my mom's birthday. I will not reveal her birthday. Anyways, we wen't to Indianapolis for the mall and looked around there. At the mall, there was this apple computer store and the computers on it had the internet. From the "Power Mac G5" in the store, I signed my guestbook. Pretty nifty huh? Anyways, all that walking in the mall wore me out. I was just surfing the blogs on blogger and I found a link to this site called "terra server". It is so very nifty. It has a huge arial map of the united states, canada, alaska, and hawaii. You can zoom in so much that you can see your house. All you have to do is type in your adress. I also found my school, which was also nifty. Some of the arial pics are old, so if you have a new house, it might still just be a foundation. I really like it. I recommend you play with it also. Anyways, after the mall, we went to this posh steakhouse place for lunch. It was a good deal, for all the food and service. $6.00 for a club sandwhich (IT WAS HUGE, BY THE WAY). It seemsed sophisticated. Only we were there though. It seemed odd to see an empty expensive restaurant.

I've revised my speech, but it doesn't sound good yet. I found a focus though. I sent it to Mr. Rice. I hope he can schedule it sometime soon. I really want to do good in it, seeing how bad I do at mathcounts (I still feel like a complete failure). I need to boost my confidence somehow...

Anyways, it's late at night and i'm feeling sluggish. I should get to sleep. But I can't because there's a feeling in me that I forgot to say something on this website. I wonder what it is. I wish I could remember. The only thing on my mind right now is high school. It's like a lion. Tame it, or be eaten. I just hope that I don't hit burnout. It seems as though Amanda needs my help (makes me feel a bit more confident) so, I would tell her, if she were reading this, to email me. I hope I don't get eaten...

-The Average Yo

item.dc:creator: ryochiba
item.content:encoded:
This is the Average Yo,
and I made a few critical discoveries over this past, uhhh, past 3 days.
Ok, I was at the gym. Hot, sweaty, sweltering, it was packed (because of those new years resolution things). I looked around and made a mental guesstamate that 1 in every 3 people had CD players. Now, that is a bit outrageous. I think that too many people are dependant on too many things. If these crucial things become a nothingnesss, I would expect revolts of stupid people to ocurr. Consequently, the global economy would spiral down in a death crunching depression (stupid people are the people who buy things). These crucial things are things like Coca-Cola (tm) and various music industries. Subsequent to the economic downfall, I predict a deadly malace to spread throughout the stupid community. This malace would effect anyone addicted to strong down rythms and caffine. In the end, the world will die and wither into a rock. That's my prediction for the next 20 years, I guess you can say that it can't happen any worse.

Also, I would like to mention my despair in mathcounts. First of all, I am the most untalented person on the team. I can't decipher any of the math terms and still can't understand many concepts covered on this team. I am extremely desparate to learn, but I'm just not that good at doing math. Even the sixth graders are ahead of me by a leap, but at least I made it on the team. I guess I could be studying stuff from the mathcounts site, but I won't understand it when I read it. I already don't understand alot of things. I am confused most of the time I am at mathcounts. Compared to everyone else on the team, I seem like such an obsolete model of human.

Now I feel depressed because I talked about mathcounts. Mathcounts always gets me depressed. Consequently, I forgot all the other topics I was going to talk about. Dang...

item.dc:creator: ryochiba

Hello, this is the Average Yo reporting in with alot to say in a little time. I'm thinking of writing a book called the "Bob Factor" but it is just a thought for now. I am writing this down so I won't forget about it. Anyways, I went to Barne's and Noble's book store to get something to study for the ACT's. I really need to start now. I have so much time that I will not have in high school. Another idea I am having is to write down notes from the book (that's always fun!) and publishing them here on a different page. That way, my studies will be choreographed constantly. I really need to get good on it. I only have 2 weeks to study, but that isn't the one that counts. The one that counts is in high school. I forget what year. Anyways, the point is that I can't doddle around all day on the weekends anymore (doddle=surf the net, burn writing utensils, and help my sister on her homework). I need to study.

Also, Miles Hunley (very creative fellow with yellow short hair, fair skin, and a knack of bragging about his stupidity) and I had a very envigorating conversation. Of course, he was making fun of his stupidity and his large guns that he supposedly owns (All of his information is purely false because he is such a liar) and he started to make fun of everyone else at the table because they didn't have guns and large lawn mowers. All the 3 years of my life, I have been wondering if he does anything useful. After a talk with him, my conclusion was that he had a smaller brain than I reckoned he had. He tried to impersonate me with an INDIAN accent. That is so very sad. My conclusions: Miles Hunley will never make a positive difference to the world; Miles Hunley thinks all Asians look and sound alike;Miles Hunley's brain is saddly distorted my television and caffine;Miles Hunley has terrible school preparation skills;Miles Hunley makes no sense sometimes;Miles Hunley is still at pre-peuberty level;Miles Hunley TRIES(pretty sad isn't is?) to act immature;Miles Hunley will die a lonely and useless man. Those are my conclusions. Consequently, my wanting to move to Amanda's table (completely populated by females) is justified. Now you know why I want to move. All these stupid morons talk about is guns and television. I hope the suffer puncture wounds in the future. That is my lunch table...

Anyways, I wrote all the ideas that I should write about on my palm3Xe so I wouldn't forget them. Actually, I should save them tomorow (i'm running short on time) Well, that's it. Happy Wednesday!

item.dc:creator: ryochiba
item.content:encoded:
Today was a day of anger, like every other day.
This is the Average Yo,
Anyways, COMM (short for communication) is always interesting. The teacher got everyone into new seats. I hate the table I sit at. Ok here's the scenario. I was sitting at the cheap semi-wood table with 4 other people. The teacher told us to get out our homework. Just like every day, everyone was too retarded to actually DO their homework. Of course, I actually had the motivation to DO my homework. Morgan, a girl who sits next to me, wants to copy off of me. I think that she is a totally fraudulent freak, but I calmly said no. I said that I spent 30 minuites on my homework and that she is not justified to let her have the answers because all my effort would be wasted if this happened. She freaked out, told this kid named Tony who sits accross from her, and then he tells me to "chill out" and "shut up". I cannot see what I did wrong in this situation and I calmly stated everything. To give away the answers would be a fraudulent thing to do, and it would also violate the contract between me and the school. Anyways, Tony and Morgan start getting angry at me. I ask why, because I did nothing, and they told me to "shut up". Then, they start showering me with choice words. Great, I have to shut up and I have no way of defending myself. All because of not giving my homework answers to this girl who sits next to me in Communications. I went out of that room thinking of all the stupid people at school and wondering why I was stuck in this H*llhole. Of course, this school I go to does wonders to my confidence.

Miles Hunley said that he went to my site. I really doubt it because he said there were pictures of "Rubber Ducks" on it. I think that he is a totall liar, but he has potential. That is only if he changes his routine soon. I still love school, but I hate the strings attached to it (eg. homework, extracurricular stuff, stupid morons, etc.)

Anyways, this weekend is going to be spent on working on a school project with Ryan Auspaugh and going to Mathcounts and studying for the ACTs. In my spare time on Sunday, I plan to make a incinerary box (A cardboard box with aluminum foil covering it) and plan to BURN my school papers in it. I can always relieve stress that way! Burn BABY BURN! Well, hopefully the cardboard box won't catch on fire and burn my house down. I better do it near a hose. Also, I think I might also do it at night and use it as a campfire. When I'm done, I can just throw the thing away so I don't have to mess with the ashes. I call it the disposable incineration device! I feel special now. I am soon to be off to Ryan's house so I better get off and try to remember if I forgot anything that i have to do. I am still trying to decide if I should spend the night a Ryan's house or just stay there for a while. I NEED TO DECIDE! Well, that's it for today!

item.dc:creator: ryochiba
item.content:encoded:
Today started out moderate and ended moderate. I went to the mathcounts meeting and found out that my ACT testing date was on the same day that my mathcounts competition was. I have to pay 16$ to change the date. It's like I'm cursed or something. Well, at mathcounts I demonstrated my stupdity. I lost every practice competition thing we had and it made me feel stupid. I guess someone has to be at the end of the line. I just wish it wasn't me. Anyways, I got home and I looked into the mailbox. To my happiness, MSN version 9 came. It is awesome. I can make picture story things. I made this funny black and white movie. If you email me and ask, I will send it to you. I am so proud. It is kind of sad that it took me an hour to create a thirty second movie. Oh well...

Anyways, I am planning to go to Barne's and Noble's. I really need to read and stuff. Playing games just makes you dumber.I also need to study my Vocab for English. Once I get that done, I can get on with my life. I also have to study factoring and everything else. I think I am paniking. All this homework I havent finished is overwhelming me. It is calling to me. If I don't get it done, I will feel like a failure. Better go do it soon...

Anyways, I hope tomorow goes well. I heard that it is going to snow 2-5 inches tonight. It will probably not, but it might. I hope it doesn't. Driving is harsh in harsh weather. I finished updating my speech and I sent it to Mr. Rice. Well, that's all I have to say.

Good Night

item.dc:creator: A.Barnett
item.content:encoded:
Blog thing, hello. What's new here? Oh, I dunno. It's snowing. I'm tired, and I'm annoyed. Oh yes, a complaint! Ha! Mock me all you want but I just can't take any more crap without venting. Ok, blog, prepare to get an earfull!
This weekend? Annoying. Why? Charlene came over. It should have been good and nice, but that kid is reeeaaly getting on my nerves. First, she's too d@mn cautious! She wont do anything without asking a million times if its ok! Second, if she doesn't get her way, she'll sulk. She doesn't use proper grammar. She wont stop hitting me! Then, when she gets hurt because I finally retaliate, she sulk,s whines, complains, or starts acting all b*tchy! It's so gosh darn annoying! Worse yet, she is just as bad as the dogs about being underfoot! She has this thing where she has to cling! It's annoying. I've tripped so many gosh d@amned times this weekend it isn;t even funny. Worse yet, when I want to be by myself with no touchie feelie things, guess who comes along?! UGGGH! >.< Bad day, bad day! Worse yet, today when we got to the library, my mother complained beuase i seemed annoyed. Who else WOULDN'T be anoyed when unresponsible parents let their gosh darn kids run around like insane little monkies?!! WHO?! WHO WOULDN'T BE! And with my anxity in public, this just made it worse. Ugh, i don't like it when people get underfoot! And then Charlene will stare at me and say 'poh your mad at me!' and then she'll run off when I'm not! I CAN control my temper. So what i got a LITTLE p*ssy at the gas station when the pump backfired on me, who the heck wouldn't? Besauides, it was only once! ONCE! Charlene gets angry all the time! Aren't I aloud to get angry too?!!!?!?!?!?! More to my bad day, Mom and Kurt are drinking, balring their Ra-forsaken music. The floor is vibrating. And would you GUESS where its the loudest? yep, my room. My freaking room. The only remotly good thing about this weekened was i was able to control my feelings and get lots of books. Thank the lucky stars for THAT little piece of heaven. And to any one reading this? I don't give a flying DUCK if you make dun of me. I'VE HAD IT!
~Amanda

item.dc:creator: ryochiba
item.content:encoded:
It is monday and if you are wondering how I am typing this, it is because my school is having a 2-hour delay. I am so happy, NOT! This means that I am going to have to finish the same ammount of homework in a lower ammount of time. Consequently, my homework:time ratio will be disturbed and my mental status trashed. I can't believe people like 2-hour delays. And when I say I do (I don't complain, it's just me explaining my differing oppinions) and explain my reasons (which are better than everyone elses) they laugh and say that I am a nerd and that I am the only one who wants to go to school. These people are like pigs (not physically, but mentally) their happy when they get sludge and eat it up. Then they never notice that they are going to be butchered in the long run. The don't go to school, do stupid things (happily by the way) and then complain when they get to school that they actually HAVE to go to school. I think all those stupid monkeys who don't want to go to school shouldn't. It would cut taxes, and people like me could get more leadway into society. Monkeys should stay if they don't want to go to school, while I go to school and appreciate that I am actually learning and doing SOMETHING and.... ARGHHHH I get angry when People don't realize what is ahead and just sit there... Waiting for the train to decapitate them... Muahhahah....

I finished 4 movies total over the weekend. I made 2 black and white old fashoned movies, one weird one about a guy named Bob, and a realistic one about me as a private investigator. If you want to see them, just email me and I will email them to you. You need Windows Media Player to play it( they are .wma files). Anyways, they are a bit humerous, and stupid.

When I type, time goes by so quickly. I have to go to school soon. Unbelievebly, it snowed like 2 inches last night. I can't believe the school decided to have a 2 hour delay. What's the point of recallibrating the system only to be turned on 2 STINKING hours later. Just make all the kids go to school at the normal time. Wow, 2 inches of snow and -10 degrees isn't going to hurt no body. 10 minuites till school.

SHOOT, I have to remind ryan to bring our poster. If he forgets, I shall erupt upon him that no man or child has ever immagined before. I better call him. Our corellation reminds me of symbyosis. I am sadly tied to his fate as well...

Anyways, when spring comes, I am going to revamp the site. Next weekend, I am going to be buisy and all that stuff. Spring will sprout up tons of unneeded school projects and I shall not have enough time to have fun making movies. I have decreased my TV watching by 95%! I only watch 20 minuites of TV each day, indirectly! Now I spend most of my time on the computer typing things like this. You know, I hate the children at school who's minds are so pliable, they sway in any direction they are reared in, and never think twice. They watch the news, the believe it. They read a book, they believe it, they read a website article, they believe it. They DON'T understand that most things on medias like these are truly FALSATE and are being guided by people with money. Sadness for all envelopes this nation. Wah Wah Wah...

Well, the bus is coming so Bye...

item.dc:creator: ryochiba
item.content:encoded:
Today, I was yet again exposed to the stupid society I am born into. This is the Average Yo...
On the bus today, people were making fun of the Islamic kid. I was infuriated by the influx of stupid comments about him. I hate people who have no justification before they act. They were making fun of them. I was like "shut up" and started talking really fast. Then this 7th grade monkey beside me just said shut up. People like this should be cast into the 13th level of h*ll and should be tortured before they are terminated from the earth. These children have no outlook on their lives, no justification for living. They are all worthless scum, and that is what powers global economy. Here is my equation of America: Stupid children+mega media advertiesing=MONEY, CASH, MOOLAH, CAPITALISTIC WOOHOO! This is the equation. I live in a society so primitive, it is extremely easy to take advantage of humans. Children robbing their parents only to spend it on materialistic wishes. Then that influx of money goes to guess who? It goes to white male anglo-saxons with decent in europe. To be a CEO you have to be a white male anglo-saxon with decent in Europe. It's that simple. That means that many a hope carried by some is worthless. That's it. And what do the white male anglo-saxon children do? They spend spend spend. They discriminate discriminate discriminate. They do as they please, or their parents will sue you. Yes, I live in a primitive world full of primitive people that have primitive thoughts about primitive things. The advantage of this is that I can easily take advantage of anyone. Ever heard of CON ARTIST? Did you know that only 1 in 5 criminals are caught? Did you know that children these days have no morals, or social outlooks? Did you ever think about what the future could bring? Did you know that the world we live in now is primitive?

Anyways, someones family around my neighboorhood just bought 2 cars and accessories. Yes, it seems turbulent times are over for people like them. The luxuary good market has had an influx of cash these days. And all that money goes to... You guessed it! White Males! Doesn't that make you feel special? Doesn't that make you feel superior? Maybe you should go out and discriminate a minority! Maybe you should go out and spend all your money on trivial items! Maybe you should not care about school and watch people throwing a brown ball around to get over a white line (football)! Maybe.... This is completely lacking logic. As with all societys, this one is not perfect.

In conclusion, many many people are stupid. Consequently, the rich get richer. That's my theory! So I guess I can say that I support stupid people.... What a sad day it is for me...
